trans-unit.source: Configuration Editing
trans-unit.target: 編輯設定值

trans-unit.source: Provides capabilities (advanced IntelliSense, auto-fixing) in configuration files like settings, launch, and extension recommendation files.
trans-unit.target: 在設定、啟動及延伸模組建議檔案等組態檔案中，提供進階 IntelliSense 及自動修正等功能。

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder opened in VS Code
trans-unit.target: 在 VS Code 中已開啟的資料夾路徑

trans-unit.source: The name of the folder opened in VS Code without any slashes (/)
trans-unit.target: 在 VS Code 內已開啟的資料夾名稱，不包含任何斜線 (/)

trans-unit.source: The current opened file relative to ${workspaceFolder}
trans-unit.target: 目前已開啟與 ${workspaceFolder} 相關的檔案

trans-unit.source: The current opened file's dirname relative to ${workspaceFolder}
trans-unit.target: 相對於 ${workspaceFolder} 的目前已開啟檔案 dirname

trans-unit.source: The current opened file
trans-unit.target: 目前已開啟的檔案

trans-unit.source: The task runner's current working directory on startup
trans-unit.target: 啟用時工作執行器目前工作目錄

trans-unit.source: The current selected line number in the active file
trans-unit.target: 在使用中的檔案內目前已選取的行數

trans-unit.source: The current selected text in the active file
trans-unit.target: 在使用中的檔案內目前已選取的文字

trans-unit.source: The current opened file's dirname
trans-unit.target: 目前已開啟檔案的 dirname

trans-unit.source: The current opened file's extension
trans-unit.target: 目前已開啟檔案的副檔名

trans-unit.source: The current opened file's basename
trans-unit.target: 目前已開啟檔案的 basename

trans-unit.source: The current opened file's basename with no file extension
trans-unit.target: 目前已開啟檔案的 basename，不包含副檔名

trans-unit.source: The name of the default build task. If there is not a single default build task then a quick pick is shown to choose the build task.
trans-unit.target: 預設建置工作的名稱。如果沒有任何預設建置工作，則會顯示快選以選擇建置工作。

trans-unit.source: Use the language of the currently active text editor if any
trans-unit.target: 使用目前使用的文字編輯器語言 (如果有的話)

trans-unit.source: the file name (e.g. myFile.txt)
trans-unit.target: 檔案名稱(例如：myFile.txt)

trans-unit.source: the path of the file relative to the workspace folder (e.g. myFolder/myFileFolder/myFile.txt)
trans-unit.target: 相對於工作區資料夾的檔案路徑 (如 myFolder/myFileFolder/myFile.txt)

trans-unit.source: the full path of the file (e.g. /Users/Development/myFolder/myFileFolder/myFile.txt)
trans-unit.target: 檔案的完整路徑 (例如 /Users/Development/myFolder/myFileFolder/myFile.txt)

trans-unit.source: the name of the folder the file is contained in (e.g. myFileFolder)
trans-unit.target: 包含檔案的資料夾名稱 (如 myFileFolder)

trans-unit.source: the path of the folder the file is contained in, relative to the workspace folder (e.g. myFolder/myFileFolder)
trans-unit.target: 包含檔案的資料夾路徑，相對於工作區資料夾 (如 myFolder/myFileFolder)

trans-unit.source: the full path of the folder the file is contained in (e.g. /Users/Development/myFolder/myFileFolder)
trans-unit.target: 包含檔案的資料夾完整路徑 (例如 /Users/Development/myFolder/myFileFolder)

trans-unit.source: name of the workspace (e.g. myFolder or myWorkspace)
trans-unit.target: 工作區名稱 (例如 myFolder or myWorkspace)

trans-unit.source: file path of the workspace (e.g. /Users/Development/myWorkspace)
trans-unit.target: 工作區檔案路徑 (例如 /Users/Development/myWorkspace)

trans-unit.source: name of the workspace folder the file is contained in (e.g. myFolder)
trans-unit.target: 包含在工作區內的檔案名稱 (例如 myFolder)

trans-unit.source: file path of the workspace folder the file is contained in (e.g. /Users/Development/myFolder)
trans-unit.target: 包含在工作區內的檔案路徑 (例如 /Users/Development/myFolder)

trans-unit.source: e.g. VS Code
trans-unit.target: 例如 VS Code

trans-unit.source: e.g. SSH
trans-unit.target: 例如 SSH

trans-unit.source: a dirty indicator if the active editor is dirty
trans-unit.target: 若使用中的編輯器已變更，即為已變更的指示區

trans-unit.source: a conditional separator (' - ') that only shows when surrounded by variables with values
trans-unit.target: 條件式分隔符號 (' - ')，只會在前後為具有值的變數時顯示

trans-unit.source: Files with Extension
trans-unit.target: 檔案副檔名

trans-unit.source: Map all files matching the glob pattern in their filename to the language with the given identifier.
trans-unit.target: 將檔案名稱符合 Glob 模式的所有檔案，對應到具有指定識別碼的語言。

trans-unit.source: Files with Path
trans-unit.target: 檔案路徑

trans-unit.source: Map all files matching the absolute path glob pattern in their path to the language with the given identifier.
trans-unit.target: 將檔案路徑符合絕對路徑 Glob 模式的所有檔案，對應到具有指定識別碼的語言。

trans-unit.source: Files by Extension
trans-unit.target: 依副檔名排列的檔案

trans-unit.source: Match all files of a specific file extension.
trans-unit.target: 比對所有具特定副檔名的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Files with Multiple Extensions
trans-unit.target: 具多個副檔名的檔案

trans-unit.source: Match all files with any of the file extensions.
trans-unit.target: 比對所有具任何副檔名的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Files with Siblings by Name
trans-unit.target: 依名稱排列且同層級的檔案

trans-unit.source: Match files that have siblings with the same name but a different extension.
trans-unit.target: 比對名稱相同但副檔名不同的同層級檔案。

trans-unit.source: Folder by Name (Top Level)
trans-unit.target: 依名稱排列的資料夾 (最上層)

trans-unit.source: Match a top level folder with a specific name.
trans-unit.target: 比對具特定名稱的最上層資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Folders with Multiple Names (Top Level)
trans-unit.target: 具多個名稱的資料夾 (最上層)

trans-unit.source: Match multiple top level folders.
trans-unit.target: 比對多個最上層資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Folder by Name (Any Location)
trans-unit.target: 依名稱排列的資料夾 (任何位置)

trans-unit.source: Match a folder with a specific name in any location.
trans-unit.target: 在所有位置比對具特定名稱的資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Disable the pattern.
trans-unit.target: 停用模式。

trans-unit.source: Enable the pattern.
trans-unit.target: 啟用模式。

trans-unit.source: Match files that have siblings with the same name but a different extension.
trans-unit.target: 比對名稱相同但副檔名不同的同層級檔案。

trans-unit.source: Language specific editor settings
trans-unit.target: 語言專用編輯器設定

trans-unit.source: Override editor settings for language
trans-unit.target: 針對語言覆寫編輯器設定
